name: Miscellaneous
description: A list of resources that cover a wide range of topics, not specific to any programming language.

resources.name: Every link I wish I had as a beginner
resources.price: Mostly free, some paid resources are included
pros: A huge collection of useful links
cons: Can be overwhelming and hard to navigate

resources.name: Sololearn
pros: Lots of languages to choose from
cons: Mostly theoretical approach, not too much repetition
Doesn't cover some topics very deeply

resources.name: LeetCode
pros: Fun and difficult problems to solve
cons: Some content requires a paid account
